website_summaries.verdict: Three-piece set gives beginners options and versatility. If you're mostly interested in facial brushing, though, consider other options.
pros: Three brushes give you flexibility and options
Body brushes give just the right amount of stimulation and exfoliation without being too harsh
cons: Some reports of brushes losing bristles
A few users say the face brush is too stiff to be beneficial

customer_reviews.title: Amazing brushes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried the Asani brush set, I have dry brushed my skin for over a year to stimulate my lymphatic system and I must say the bristles on the Asani brush set are the best . I spent a pretty penny on other brushes looking for the right ones and I have found them. I recommend them 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Medina

customer_reviews.title: Who knew?
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know anything about dry brushing before getting these. I have extremely dry skin in the winter and after using these one time I didn't need to apply lotion after a bath! The brushes are soft yet firm, very comfortable to use. The longest is perfect for a nice back scratch rather then the typical back scratches. Quality brushes!
customer_reviews.author: ChelleK

customer_reviews.title: I use these brushes every day
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a Cellerciser (rebounder) and it's important to brush your skin to keep the pores unobstructed by the release of toxins in your system. I use these brushes every morning upon waking and several times a day before each rebounding session. They work great. Having three sizes comes in handy. Over time you will develop which brush you prefer to use for what specific part of your body. BTW: The long handled brush will stay together just fine if you strongly push the handle into the groove on the brush. Anyone who says otherwise needs to do more exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dry brushing
customer_reviews.text: I had never used dry brushes before ordering these. I researched the basic on dry brushing. ( thank you Pinterest) I love how my skin feels afterwards! Looking forward to the health benefits of dry brushing .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THESE BRUSHES FEEL GREAT ON MY SKIN!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these brushes! I'm new to the practice of "dry brushing", but I've read so many articles about the health benefits that I thought I'd give it a try. THESE BRUSHES FEEL GREAT ON MY SKIN!!! These brushes feel so good on my skin & don't scratch me up! I've read other reviews for other dry brushes & they sound horrible! These are, well made, good quality, soft bristled, dry brushes & they get the blood circulating to your skin's surface! I'm going to order another set, so I have them when these wear out!
customer_reviews.author: M C Jilly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My first impression was how easy the brushes were to use. Handles were the right length to reach all areas and curved in the right places. A guideline to body brushing would have been helpful but was easy enough to find via youtube. Would be great for anyone who is interested in trying body brushing.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Dees

customer_reviews.title: Dry brushing is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I had never tried dry brushing before buying this product and now I’m telling everyone I know to start doing it! With just a few minutes a day you will see massive improvements. I love that they have all 3 sizes to help with even the tough to reach spots. The facial one is by far my favorite but I use them all equally. If you are considering trying out dry this is the set for you. High quality and low cost seriously the best combination! Also made with bamboo so sustainable and good for the environment. I will be buying a bunch of sets as Christmas gifts this year for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Towles

customer_reviews.title: Great Brushes!
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality brushes. The bristles are soft and yet have enough strength to exfoliate. They have not bend or matted down. I have been using the small one to remove dirt from under my nails as I have been gardening and working outside, the medium for my feet as again I am working in flower beds and garden I need an extra scrub on my feet, and the large on my back and shoulders. They do the job and have held up well. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Billie Jo Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Love the brushes
customer_reviews.text: I loved these brushes. Easy on skin. I liked the different sizes. However the handle tends to pop off every now and then. I use the longer one to scrub my feet and going back and forth the handle pops off. Overall I still use it and I do love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H

customer_reviews.title: I love these brushes!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first because I couldn't even fathom how some brushes would work well for exfoliating (at least as well as my sugar scrub). After having used them for a while, I have to say...they are great! I love the sizes, the softness is just right. The only thing that could be improved is the little face brush which is the one I use the most, the particular one I have has bristles that fall out more often than I want them too. I'm absolutely getting another one of these for my sister in law!
customer_reviews.author: AlexandraK.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a solid set of brushes.
customer_reviews.text: I am new to dry brushing so I don’t have a lot to compare these brushes to, but I am very pleased. Great price and I feel like they are just stiff enough to exfoliate and stimulate skin and underlying tissues without being too abrasive. The facial brush is a little harsh but i use it lightly about once a week and it is tolerable. My skin feels amazing after dry brushing and then using a sugar/coffee scrub. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JamScam

customer_reviews.title: Oh Wow!! 2 Big Thumbs up!! Love it
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THESE BRUSHES. I prefer the medium size hand size. At first When I unboxed them, I thought it might be a a little flimsy, but No... It works excellent. I lathered up some soap, turner off water and went to town. I happily brushed my entire body. It felt like layers and layers of dead skin cells were being softy brushed off. My skin felt fresh and soft immediately after. Definitely my new favorite. Strongly suggest. I am considering what else this brand has to offer. 2 thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Professor35

customer_reviews.title: Nice Brush set
customer_reviews.text: Its been always not this easy to exfoliate the skin. Till now I used to wonder about a perfect body brush and this brush came out excellent to my imagination. The length of the brush is just perfect, you can easily reach to any part of your body without putting much efforts. The only thing about I am little skeptical is face brush, I found it to be a little hard for the soft skin of the face. But this might differs person to person because my face is more prone to pimples, therefore there are high chances of sensitivity. Overall, I will definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but...no instructions....
customer_reviews.text: So I received and used my new dry brushes. I have to say, they are great. After using them, showering and moisturizing my skin, it felt baby soft. The brushes are stiff, so you have to be careful about how much pressure you put on your skin. My only complaint is that there are no instructions included and for someone who is new to dry brushing, it took some research as to how to dry brush properly. Just a simple picture of the body with the direction you should brush and how often you should brush would have made this a 5 star product in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: nmillwood00

customer_reviews.title: High quality, super soft
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are fantastic and I’m obsessed with them. I was worried that dry brushing might be a little rough but the softness of these brushes put that fear aside. They leave an exhilaratingly soft tingle that wakes up my skin and leaves it baby soft. I even got my husband using them and loving them on his super sensitive skin 🥰 I highly recommend these for the quality, price and super fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amery

customer_reviews.title: It's a must if you have ingrown hair, amazing exfoliate
customer_reviews.text: First I thought it's quite a hard brush, but it's been 15+ days and I'm loving these brushes too much. They are too comfortable and quite easy to use. I used to have a hell lot of ingrown hair due to immature waxing at home, but these brushings are giving me so much love. they are removing my in-grown hair and I can actually feel the smoothness after this use. Do give a try, they are affordable and such a good quality
customer_reviews.author: Poonam kandpal

customer_reviews.title: I’m Addicted!
customer_reviews.text: I love these brushes! The bristles are great...strong so that I would think the brushes will last a long time but soft enough that they’re not harsh on my skin. This is the first time I have dry brushed and I’m addicted! My skin feels soft yet invigorated. I like the different sizes of the brush heads and I love that you can separate one of the brushes from the handle and use it as a hand held dry brush. I am a little wary of the small face brush. I think it would be too harsh for my sensitive skin. Overall, I’m super pleased with this set of Dry Brushes!
customer_reviews.author: DreamKay

customer_reviews.title: Great brushes! Don't feel cheap! Great price.
customer_reviews.text: love these! I had a cheap Walmart dry brush that ended up breaking way too soon. These don't feel cheap, they are a little rough if you aren't used to try brushing but they are exactly what you need for dry brushing! I did have a few bristles fall out after my first use but I imagine that is to be expected. I haven't had any issues with that since and I use them daily. Love the different sizes. They have worked wonders on my stretch marks and dry skin, alongside some good quality lotions after use of course!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Rajcich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brushes!
customer_reviews.text: What I like most of all about this brush set from Asani that they are really natural, soft and very pleasant to touch for such kinesthetic people as me. Thanking different sizes it is very comfortable to use for all parts of a body even in a small bath cabin. Also you should not put a lot effort to clean them. So, l enjoy this brush set and reccomend it to all.
customer_reviews.author: Tetiana

customer_reviews.title: Dry brush for health
customer_reviews.text: This is my first dry brushing set and I absolutely love it. I've read about the benefits of dry brushing and have wanted to try it for a while. I'm so glad I did. My skin is brighter, looks healthier and I feel great. I actually look forward to brushing and do it about 3x/week. I love that this set includes 3 brushes which allows you to easily use them all over your body. They are all high quality brushes and contured for easy use. The bristles are firm and take a little getting used but totally worth it. You'll love the way it makes you feel.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT A.

customer_reviews.title: The body brush is great but the face brush is too stiff
customer_reviews.text: The body brush is great. The angle it's at is perfect for reaching everywhere but I'm not sure the bristles are as stiff as I'd prefer? Still, I think it works well. Unfortunately, the face brush is TOO stiff and is uncomfortable/almost hurts my face when I use it. I won't be using that again.
customer_reviews.author: Three Dog Circus

customer_reviews.title: Received Used Set as US nears 5M in COVID Cases
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for these brushes to arrive. Excitement turned to disgust when I opened an unsealed ripped box to find 1) none of the brushes were individually packed as described 2) All three brushes showed wear. It is completely unacceptable for anyone to sell used hygiene items let alone in July 2020 as COVID cases and deaths continue to increase. The brushes actually appeared to be nice but can only rate a 1 (prefer 0) based on USED HYGIENIC PRODUCTS ARE SOLD AS NEW ONES. For reasons explained I could not use any of the brushes and will be returning this set and ordering elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Paris B.

customer_reviews.title: Soft but good
customer_reviews.text: I am new to dry brushing. I've only had it done at a spa before. This set of brushes was softer than what I had experienced at the spa. It felt good though.
customer_reviews.author: N. Little

customer_reviews.title: Good product for getting rid of dead skin
customer_reviews.text: I like the Dry brushing set. It’s very helpful in getting rid of dead skin, makes the skin soft & supple especially in this dry & cold weather. Another good point is it comes with handles so it’s very useful in dry brushing back which otherwise is difficult to reach with hands. The brush is very soft so it doesn’t hurt while brushing on skin. It comes in 3 different sizes so can be used in different ways as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Prahlad A N

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great brushes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the brushes for 4 days. I couldn’t wait to try them. I love the way the bristles feel on my skin. It’s not to hard or to soft, even on more sensitive areas it feels great. Overall after 4 days of using my skin feels very soft, not that it was rough before but I can feel a difference and have no complaints with these brushes. I love the different sizes because it makes brushing your skin easier for smaller parts.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Weatherholt

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite brush set. Enjoying the 3 different sizes. The large one is perfect for hard to reach areas of your back. The medium size one is great for my feet and my favorite, the small one does wonders for my face. The bristles really do the trick not too soft and not too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brushes for dry brushing your skin - imp to have the variety
customer_reviews.text: Have you tried dry brushing your skin - arms, legs, neck, etc before you take a shower? Fabulous for getting dry skin off and for softer skin. These brushes are perfect - I bought them for my sister in CA. The ones I use and wanted to buy for my sister were sold out, so I purchased these and she said they’re great.
customer_reviews.author: Good Life

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my beauty routine
customer_reviews.text: These dry brushes are great! I use them once or twice a week before I get in the shower. I've noticed a difference in my skin and have come to enjoy the ritual. The smallest brush has a little curve in the handle which makes it nicely ergonomic. I also like that they have a loop on the end to make them easy to hang!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Love these brushes
customer_reviews.text: This set is just what I was looking for in dry brushes. The body brushes give the right amount of friction but with no abrasion. Not sure about the facial one as I am not confident in using such a strong brush on the face.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B.

customer_reviews.title: Feel Great
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are not supposed to be super soft. They have sturdy bristles that you can use as soft or hard on your skin as you want. Using them is very invigorating and makes my skin feel soft aftewards.
customer_reviews.author: MMV

customer_reviews.title: Dry Brushing Body Brush Set
customer_reviews.text: I recieved Wed & tried it out right away. When took out of box some bristles where shedding. Since it is natural hair on brush I figured would be. I have used 4 times & I am loving it. Not harsh on skin at all. So glad I bought this one. I recommend to anyone with sensitive skin like me.
customer_reviews.author: TAZ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Asani 3 piece brush kit for a few days and can tell a difference in my skin. Dry winter months is extremely hard on my skin, very pleased with the outcome. Can’t wait to see what it will be like after a month. It’s a great price for 3 brushes. I found guides on Pinterest on how to dry brush.
customer_reviews.author: Tina K Trent

customer_reviews.title: love the long handled one best
customer_reviews.text: Really liking these brushes. I am still learning about dry brushing, & these are working great for me. Well made quality product. Love having 3 size long handled is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Shine and Glow with comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I must say I love my new body brushes, after dry brushing I noticed a glow to my skin. Im very impressed woth the return policy and life time promise on the brushes all three brushes in the set are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Varela

customer_reviews.title: Try "DRY BRUSHING"
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a friend who is on recovery from second heart surgery. He complained of retaining water and his skin,"just not right". A friend recommended DryBrushing...he watched the video, used the brush and felt relief....mission accomplished.
customer_reviews.author: TEACHER

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brushes
customer_reviews.text: I tried the Asani brush set, I have dry brushed my skin for over a year to stimulate my lymphatic system and I must say the bristles on the Asani brush set are the best . I spent a pretty penny on other brushes looking for the right ones and I have found them. I recommend them 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Neha James

customer_reviews.title: Definately suggest buying from this company and these brushes!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing customer service hands down by reaching out asking about their product since receiving and also if i have any questions or concerns- " reach out them". The brushes are perfect thus far . I have had them approx. 3 weeks. I use all 3 to fit areas of my body. The bristles do not fall out while brushing. I know this because im in my dry tub while brushing. Best buy for the price and outstanding quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: I received a used brush while I was charged for a new brush set
customer_reviews.text: The small brush with handle has been used before, the bristles have evidence of being worn out which can be liken to an old toothbrush that is ready to be discarded. I thought I paid for a new brush set and not refurbished. I know the product I was sent was not a new one because I bought a similar brush set from Rosena (which was delivered a day apart) everything looked similar except the little brush that is worn out already. This is what my review was based on.
customer_reviews.author: MsFun

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good not high quality in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are great but the only thing I don't like about them is right when I took them out if the box alot of the bristles had fallen out of the brush already
customer_reviews.author: James Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Love these brushes..
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use these brushes for a month and it's been amazing! I would definitely recommend anyone wanting to purchase them to get them. They are sturdy and do an excellent brushing job.
customer_reviews.author: KatzKiss

customer_reviews.title: Quality,Quality,Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with these brushes. A dry brush was suggested to me for my dry skin. After a few days my skin was softer and glowing. I was amazed at how well they work. I recommend fallowing the direction for best results.
customer_reviews.author: angie cantu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Set of Brushes
customer_reviews.text: Tried out the set last night. Before using I searched some youtube videos and found a lot of valuable information. Used them before getting into the sauna and sweated a lot more than usual after the dry brushing session.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Loved that it came with 3 different sizes - so great for the price. Skin feels great after using them. Always used loofah before. This is better for getting rid of dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne Hebden

customer_reviews.title: My skin is so soft and healthy looking now
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these brushes for several days now. I am amazed at how soft my skin has become. My skin looks much healthier. I'm very fair skinned and I think my color looks much healthier since I've been dry brushing. Would definitely recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ehren

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a suggestion of someone on social media that I follow. I have used the brushes a few times and they work great. They are great quality and were a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie

customer_reviews.title: My skin feels awesome
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect balance not too soft but not harsh on my skin. The face on especially is my favorite. It makes my skin feel so clean and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have never used dry brushes before but thought I would give these are try based on recommendations from others about how well dry brushes work in general. After using these for a couple of weeks, I have noticed a change in my skin especially in the cold winter months. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea P.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love them
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my mom because she has diabetes and her legs hurt sometimes. To our surprise, her leg hair started to grow back. We love these brushes❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Elena Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Great brushes!
customer_reviews.text: Love the brushes! Having 3 different sizes to choose from makes it super easy! I have not noticed any bristles falling out and they still feel new after using them for weeks. I do wish it came with some instructions. After researching, I was surprised there is a “correct” way to dry brush. However, it was easy enough to do a quick search. I would definitely recommend these to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love all three
customer_reviews.text: Love all three, but I am careful about using a brush on my face (I am too rough).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Set of Brushes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Exfoliating Brushes for bathing and dry brushing. Really does the trick for an extremely reasonable price. Nice to use with your favorite salt scrub as well.
customer_reviews.author: V. Denton

customer_reviews.title: Exfoliation Time..
customer_reviews.text: It was in moment buying after watching “Adam ruins everything “ for cleaning episode but glad i bought it . It exfoliates your skin and you are good with shower afterwards . The quality of bristles is nice and feels soft to skin. Really like the back brush.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush Set
customer_reviews.text: These brushes feel awesome! They leave my skin feeling great afterwards and don't scratch it up. I love the three different sizes that the brushes come in. I use the small one on my face every night before bed. My husband loves them too. Only negative is when I first opened the box, the brushes shed a lot. Since then though, there has been no shedding.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was actually surprised in how much I would like these dry brushes! My first thought was the bristles were a little rough however once I actually used it my skin felt so incredibly soft! I’m completely sold and will use these on a weekly basis!! Win win!!
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Good Price
customer_reviews.text: The brushes are of good quality. Price is excellent for the three brush set. I have used them three times. This is the first time I have tried dry brushing, skin does feel smoother and my skin seems less dry. Brushes not too harsh or stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The bristles on this Asani brush set are my favorite by far. They are good quality and comfortable to use on my skin. Some other brushes leave your skin looking red, but I never experienced with these brushes. I highly recommend this set. They are affordable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is great!
customer_reviews.text: This product was my first experience with dry body brushing. I'm now asking why had I never heard of dry body brushing before this? The brushes do a wonderful job of refreshing the skin and calming the emotions, and producing a feeling of wellness. I recommend dry brushing with this product from toes to head at least 2 to 3 times every week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great brushes!
customer_reviews.text: These brushes have been perfect for me. My skin feels softer in the few days I have been using them. I am excited to keep using them and getting more benefits from them.
customer_reviews.author: Burris2009

customer_reviews.title: Dry Brush Set
customer_reviews.text: The brushes were soft but firm. I saw a difference in my skin right away. The long handle brush was awesome as it reached areas I couldn't reach normally.
customer_reviews.author: Karee Baynocky

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Soft bristles good dry or wet. It is made with Boar (Pig) Hair
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Iqbal

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great variety of sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Love that this set comes with three different sizes making it easy to reach all areas like the back. Brushes she'd a little at first but after a few uses it stopped.
customer_reviews.author: I. Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and useful
customer_reviews.text: Needs instructions but made great gifts and bought myself a set too. Crafted nice and sturdy doesn’t lose bristles that’s important.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Harper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set for all your skin needs
customer_reviews.text: Recently started dry brushing and loved this set. The brushes are enough soft and daily use has definitely made my skin much smooth and free of dry skin. The grip on these brushes is easy to hold onto. I rarely use the face brush, found it a little harsh in my skin, but the other two work like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: pagar

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are soft enough for exfoliating but firm enough for a good back scratcher. I bought it several weeks ago and it has held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: janchan

customer_reviews.title: Soft natural bristles!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice, natural bristle brushes. I was occasionally dry brushing with a different brush, but these feel much nicer. They brush off the dry skin leaving it soft and smooth. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gourdier

customer_reviews.title: They are soft.
customer_reviews.text: These body brushes are ok the one for the back doesn't stay together so it is just a short hand brush. Tgey are soft and they make your skin feel clean.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Peterson

customer_reviews.title: First time dry brushing :)
customer_reviews.text: I loved the long body handle and the hand held brush fit nicely in my hand :) the small face one did a great job! Super happy with results.
customer_reviews.author: Monarch

customer_reviews.title: dry brush body set
customer_reviews.text: Really like the product. The one brush doesn't want to stay on the handle otherwise a great product and worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: atter

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a set of dry skin brush
customer_reviews.text: The brunches sizes are okay and easy to reach. Brush off dry skin is fine but it is too soft to stimulate blood vessels and lymphatic vessels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Bristles are just the perfect amount of stiffness. Definitely did the job! Love that there are three including one for the face and one long enough to reach the back!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love the 3 sizes, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, sturdy brush set with 3 great sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Keiki

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like the brushes very much, they are just a little stiff. But my skin feels so smooth after using them
customer_reviews.author: Mary Smith

customer_reviews.title: Dry Brushing
customer_reviews.text: This is the 1st body brush which Bought this last month and so far seeing some good results. Hopefully skin will get better
customer_reviews.author: Santhosh

customer_reviews.title: High quality, arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: The brushes shipped quickly and are in good condition. I just started using them, so I can't report on results, but they seem firm enough to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: The brushes were perfect. I loved that the handle detached on the big body brush. The face brush left my skin feeling rejuvenated and refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Minda Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Quick delivery and good quality. I’ve only been using for a few days but I’m happy so far. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly T. Langlois

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I ordered few days ago. I was suprised about the quality for how much i paid. I definitely order one for the husband as he already looked at mine.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Brush set
customer_reviews.text: I love the Brush Set not only me but my whole family loves it too. Only thing that need that I hope was that the Brush was softer but it other then that I love it...Always wanted one
customer_reviews.author: Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Nice brushes
customer_reviews.text: Brushes work great - they do shed a bit but overall good product
customer_reviews.author: Katey Akins

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value and quality. It’s not as stiff and painful as some are. I like the 3 different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great brushes!
customer_reviews.text: Since moving to CA my skin is much drier and now that we’ve had some cold days it’s even worse! These brushes have helped greatly to exfoliate and make my skin feel softer. I can’t wait to keep using them to see even more benefits!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The brushes are really soft and nice .I was really surprised by the quality . Love them .
customer_reviews.author: pumytza

customer_reviews.title: Partial order only received.
customer_reviews.text: I only received the 2 larger brushes. No facial brush.
customer_reviews.author: BJR

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect I love them , Good quality, I feel my skin really clean..
customer_reviews.author: Isela A.

customer_reviews.title: Love these strong brushes
customer_reviews.text: I tried these out and the large size is wonderful and my favorite is the middle size which is good on my legs and feet.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Brushes
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are well made and exfoliate very well. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BRUSHES
customer_reviews.text: Great product, Great price! Brushes are firm, but not too firm. The variety of brushes are very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: amw2mom

customer_reviews.title: Invigorating!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! My skin feels great after brushing. They are not as soft as I would have expected, but I think the firmness adds to the wonderful way they invigorate my skin!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: All you will need for dry brushing
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for what i needed, and loved the small face brush
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love the dry brushing set. First time doing dry brushing. The bristles are soft and gentle on my skin. I believe this to be a good product and good price for the set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I just found out about body brushing not too long ago & decided to give it a go with this brush set, I was not disappointed! This set is very sturdy and has a great feel to it. The length is perfect & I love the fact that the long brush comes apart. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chauncey Mason

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing ,very soft ,neat and works great.It arrived on time in a well packed.It worth every penny you pay for this item. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Home

customer_reviews.title: Great body brush set
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a short handle brush, this set has all the brushing qualities for a body, face and those hard to reach areas, I love them! Well made with high quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Hard to reach back itch?
customer_reviews.text: Loved all the brushes for exfoliating... the long one is the greatest back scratcher ever.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Casella

customer_reviews.title: Only a set of 2
customer_reviews.text: I do like the brushes but I gave it one star because I only received 2 brushes. The long brush and the facial brush.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: Great brushes. Work really well and get to the hard to reach areas.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Whitlow

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like using these for dry brushing with essential oils. The bristles are soft but firm enough to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Bltjr21

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted...I have one in the shower, one in the bedroom nightstand and one in my travel case! Thanks for such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: ndgriffin

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I like the way my skin feels after brushing it. It feels nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: They are a super value for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: After reading that dry brushing is so good for your skin, I decided to try. These brushes were just what I was looking for. They are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: B. Whitten

product_meta.title: Dry Brushing Body Brush Set with 100% Natural Boar Bristles (Set of 3) | Skin Exfoliating Kit with Long Detachable Back Brush, Contour Body and Face Brushes | Lymphatic Drainage, Cellulite Treatment
feature_bullets: QUALITY YOU’LL LOVE: Rejuvenate, detoxify, and exfoliate your skin with a dry brushing set that never compromises on quality. Unlike others that have synthetic bristles that irritate skin, our dry brush kit is made using 100% natural boar bristles for deep yet safe exfoliation and lymphatic drainage.

A BRUSH FOR EVERY TASK: This set of 3 skin brushes gives you the freedom to hit the whole body. It comes with a long-handled back brush with a detachable brush head, a body brush with a handle contoured for enhanced comfort, and a facial exfoliator brush to give your face the spa treatment.

A WORLD OF BENEFITS: Scrub your way to a radiant complexion and amazing well-being. This dry body scrubber set removes dry, dead skin cells to reveal a rejuvenated layer underneath, combats ingrown hairs, helps clear acne, smooths cellulite and stimulates lymphatic drainage.

GREAT GIFT IDEA: Looking for a unique gift for that special someone? This natural bristle brush set makes a memorable treat to crown that holiday, birthday and everything in between. We’ve packed it in a beautiful gift box to inspire huge smiles at first glimpse.

LIFETIME WARRANTY: We’ve backed our massage brush set with an iron-clad lifetime warranty to give you total peace of mind and the best bang for your buck. Go ahead, dry brush your way to a beautiful glow, smooth skin, and an invigorated feeling 100% risk-free!
